name: Furina
storytext: Perpetual muse of chansons and rondeaux.
source: Reward for inviting Furina to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Soloist's Solicitation
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Once per Round:</color> If you do not have <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112113]</color> in your Hand, create 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112113]</color> card in your Hand.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Once per Round:</color> If you do not have <color=#FFFFFFFF>Seats Sacred and Secular</color> in your Hand, create 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Seats Sacred and Secular</color> card in your Hand.
skills.description:
Deals 2 Physical DMG.
Once per Round: If you do not have Seats Sacred and Secular in your Hand, create 1 Seats Sacred and Secular card in your Hand.

skills.name: Salon Solitaire
skills.descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1211]</color> is currently in the {SPRITE_PRESET#3504}Arkhe: Ousia state. Summons <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112111]</color>.\n(When $[A1211] is in the {SPRITE_PRESET#3505}Arkhe: Pneuma state, she will summon <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112112]</color> instead)
skills.descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Furina</color> is currently in the {SPRITE_PRESET#3504}Arkhe: Ousia state. Summons <color=#FFFFFFFF>Salon Members</color>.\n(When Furina is in the {SPRITE_PRESET#3505}Arkhe: Pneuma state, she will summon <color=#FFFFFFFF>Singer of Many Waters</color> instead)
skills.description:
Furina is currently in the Arkhe: Ousia state. Summons Salon Members.
(When Furina is in the Arkhe: Pneuma state, she will summon Singer of Many Waters instead)

skills.name: Let the People Rejoice
skills.description: Deals 2 Hydro DMG, creates 1 Universal Revelry.

skills.name: Arkhe: Seats Sacred and Secular
skills.descriptionraw: (Passive) When battle begins, create 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112113]</color> card in your Hand.
skills.descriptionreplaced: (Passive) When battle begins, create 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Seats Sacred and Secular</color> card in your Hand.
skills.description: (Passive) When battle begins, create 1 Seats Sacred and Secular card in your Hand.
